query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: 2nd Data Management Plan
result.description: The Deliverable will include the 2nd Data Management Plan. The Data Management Plan (DMP) will detail what data the project will generate, whether and how it will be exploited or made accessible for verification and re-use, and how it will be curated and preserved.

result.title: Engagement and empowerment report for collaborative learning a.M12
result.description: D4.3 a), b) and c): Engagement and empowerment report for collaborative learning (LEG, R, PU, M12, M24, M33). M12 This report presents the intermediate results of citizen engagement documenting the number of activities (e.g. “Air Quality days”, school project), people involved, training and dissemination material provided, etc in the three testbeds. This report includes national reports on the engagement activities and empowerment strategies achieved.

"Report ""Mapping the landscape of environmental monitoring in Europe"" based on WP2-5 findings (M4, Report, PU, Responsible: IAAC) This document report will contain a summary of best practices including tools and methodologies, used in successful participatory sensing initiatives.

result.title: Standardization Report
result.description: The standardization-related efforts and achievements will be collected in this report, with a focus on federated identity, secure asynchronous messaging (email), synchronous messaging, and privacy-enhanced crowd-sourcing for collective intelligence via privacy-enhanced cloud analytics. The state of the standardization of each of these deliverables and their uptake by both grassroots-activists, governments, and industry will be assessed.
